sect1.title: Preface
sect1.para: This is the user's guide to the GStreamer Pipeline Editor, also known as gst-editor. The editor allows the user to view, manipulate, and run GStreamer media pipelines. Pipelines can be saved to GStreamer's standard XML file format, which can then be loaded up for use in a custom application. It can also read in XML dumps of pipelines in custom applications, allowing easy visualization of GStreamer internals.
Quick help and answers to frequently asked questions can be found in the "Quick Start" section. A more in-depth reference can be found later on in the manual.
This document is not intended to be a full reference on GStreamer. Users wanting more information should take a look at the GStreamer Application Developer's Manual.
